Class StudentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
org.cst8288Lab2.Implement.StudentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentDAO
public class StudentDAOImpl extends Object implements StudentDAO
Implementation of the StudentDAO interface that provides data access to the Student table.
